verses.text: \w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* heard \w something|strong="G4183"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, “Hallelujah! \w Salvation|strong="G4991"\w*, \w power|strong="G1411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* belong \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;
